channel.title: swift project â€“ Questions and answers (aka FAQs)
channel.description: Recent content in Questions and answers (aka FAQs) on swift project

item.title: Docs: ATC failed to connect error 10061
item.description: If a connection to a single ATC station fails check if the station really supports voice control. Some people set up a voice room but do NOT provide voice ATC.

item.title: Docs: How can I restrict the number of aircraft?
Docs: How can i start swift map?
Docs: How to fly as co-pilot (copilot)?
Docs: I do not see other planes, no other aircraft, no other traffic
item.description:
• If you fail to see other aircraft please check: notrendered{.interpreted-text role=“ref”}
  • Top 4 XPlane problems:
Based on yesterday's experience, there are 4 top problems using //swift// and XPlane
* no models are shown / no other aircraft, in most of the cases the aircraft folder is in the wrong place. see [here](https://swift-project.github.io/docs/manual/swiftgeneral/notrendered/) or you did not create a model set
* landing gear not visible or always visible: conflict with other pilot client, remove any other pilot client or AI traffic plugin you have installed, e.g. XSquawkBox, X-IvAp, PilotEdge, WorldTraffic.
* aircraft are too high or low: The offset fix is not installed or incorrectly installed. [See here](https://swift-project.github.io/docs/installation/xplane/xplanecg/)
* If you **move your model folder you need to reload your models in the mapping tool and recreate the model set** [see](https://swift-project.github.io/docs/manual/swiftgeneral/modelsandmodelset/createms/)

item.title: Docs: I see no other traffic
item.description:
• If you fail to see other aircraft please check: notrendered{.interpreted-text role=“ref”}
  • Top 4 XPlane problems: https://dev.swift-project.org/phame/post/view/10/top_4_swift_and_xplane_topics/

item.title: Docs: Models not accessible
item.description:
If you see a message, "models not accessible", check the page:

  • whyvalidationerrors{.interpreted-text role=“ref”}
  • modelsetvalidation{.interpreted-text role=“ref”}
  • modelsetvalidationexample{.interpreted-text role=“ref”}

item.title: Docs: Temp disable a model
item.description:
You can temp disable a model, then remove it (or them) from the set.

See modelsetvalidation{.interpreted-text role=“ref”} for details.

item.title: Docs: XPlane gear always up / animations not working
item.description:
• If you see your gear always up, or animations not working (in XPlane), see troubleshooting{.interpreted-text role=“ref”} ("animations")
  • Another reasons is if the other client sends wrong parts, see interpolationexamples{.interpreted-text role=“ref”}
